title: ESPuino
restartinfo:
ESPuino is being restarted...
Page reloads automatically after restart finished.
shutdowninfo:
ESPuino is now switched off...
Page reloads automatically when the ESPuino is switched on again.

toast.conlost: Connection to ESPuino broken! Please reload website.

directory.title: Directory
directory.desc: Upload directory with all files and subdirectories

fileurl.title: File, directory or URL (^ and # aren't allowed as chars)

mode.12: Single track of a directory (random). Followed by sleep.
mode.7: All tracks of a directory (sorted, loop)
mode.9: All tracks of a directory (random, loop)
mode.13: All tracks of a random subdirectory (sorted)
mode.14: All tracks of a random subdirectory (random)
mode.11: List (files from SD and/or webstreams) from local .m3u-File

cmd.107: Sleep after end of five tracks

start.title: Start FTP-server
start.desc: Enables FTP-server until device is restarted.

sink.title: ESPuino as Bluetooth speaker
sink.desc: ESPuino is started as a Bluetooth speaker. After switching to this mode, the web interface will no longer be available until the system is restarted in normal mode.

source.title: Connect with Bluetooth headphone
source.desc: The device connects to the specified Bluetooth headset. After switching to this mode, the web interface will no longer be available until the system is restarted in normal mode.

equalizer.title: Equalizer
equalizer.info: According to the library (ESP32-audioI2S), the frequencies are 500 Hz LowShelf, 3000 Hz PeakEQ and 6000 Hz HighShelf.

options.title: Options
options.playMonoExp: If two speakers are installed, stereo can be played. More infos here.
options.savePlayPosShutdownExp: When the box is switched off, the playback position for audio books is saved. More infos here under SAVE_PLAYPOS_BEFORE_SHUTDOWN.
options.savePlayPosRfidChange: Remember playback position at RFID tag change
options.savePlayPosRfidChangeExp: When switching to a new RFID tag, the playback position is saved for audio books. Does not affect modification tags. More infos here under SAVE_PLAYPOS_WHEN_RFID_CHANGE.
options.pauseOnMinVolumeExp: Playback is paused when the volume reaches the minimum level. More infos here
options.recoverVolBootExp: After a restart, the speaker remembers which volume was last used and automatically adjusts it again.
options.volumeCurveExp: Use of logarithmic volume calculation. Can help if the gradations in the lower volume range are too coarse.

battery.title: Battery
battery.lowWarning: Show warning below this threshold (in volt)
battery.lowCritical: Lowest voltage (in volt), that is indicated by one LED
battery.criticalShutoff: Below this voltage (in volt), ESPuino turns off
battery.high: Voltage (in volt), that is indicated by all LEDs

playlist.title: Playlist
playlist.sortMode: Sorting mode for playlist and file browser

nvs.title: Saved RFID assignments
nvs.desc: The RFID assignments are not stored on the SD card but on the internal, non-volative storage (NVS) of the ESPuino.

list.title: List of all stored RFID assignments

erase.title: Erase all RFID assignments
erase.desc:
Via importer new entries will only be inserted but old ones won't be erased. Only in case an old assignment to the same entry already exists, it will be overwritten. With this function all existing RFID assignments will be erased.
Further infos (in German).

import.title: Import
import.desc: A backup file can be uploaded here in order to import RFID assignments.

export.title: Export
export.desc: A backup file can be download here in order to export the RFID assignments.

fwupdate.title: Firmware-Update
fwupdate.desc: Firmware can be updated right here.

forum.title: Forum
forum.desc:
Having problems or aim to discuss about ESPuino?
Join us at ESPuino-Forum! Especially there's a lot of (german) documentation online!

swagger.title: Swagger
swagger.desc: Documentation of the REST API: Swagger.

systeminfo.title: Information
systeminfo.hallsensor: HallEffectSensor NullFieldValue: {{hsnullfieldvalue}}, actual: {{hsactual}}, diff:{{hsdiff}}, LastWaitFor_State:{{hslastwaitforstate}} (waited:{{hswaited}} ms)
